description:
FastMeeting allows you to communicate with others in voice, video or text, and share whiteboards, documents or desktop screens. It is widely used in many scenarios including business meeting, remote education and online training.


Support for adding RTSP and RTMP streams as video sources
Optimize the audio algorithm library
Support private cloud enterprises in configuring voice subtitles, subtitle translation, and subtitle settings
source: 深圳齐心好视通云计算有限公司
